    • Leader [340pts]

      • Aetheric Navigator [80pts]

        Selections: 2. Sledgeshock Hammer

        Categories: AETHERIC NAVIGATOR, DUARDIN, HERO, SKYFARERS, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Leader, Artefact

        Artefact: Sledgeshock Hammer, Unit: Aetheric Navigator, Unit Abilities: Aethersight, Aetherstorm, Read the Winds, Weapon: Ranging Pistol, Zephyrscope


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Sledgeshock Hammer Pick one of the bearer’s melee weapons to be a Sledgeshock Hammer. Add 1 to wound rolls made for this weapon.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Aetheric Navigator 4"573+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aethersight An Aetheric Navigator can attempt to unbind a spell in each enemy hero phase as if they were a wizard.
        Aetherstorm In your hero phase, an Aetheric Navigator can attempt to manipulate the aether to cause a storm. If they do so, roll a dice. On a 3 or more they are successful – until your next hero phase, enemy units that can fly must halve their Move characteristic if they begin their movement phase within 18" of the Aetheric Navigator.
        Read the Winds If an Aetheric Navigator does not move in the movement phase, you can re-roll the dice for all visible friendly SKYVESSELS when they run or charge. You cannot use this ability in a turn in which an Aetheric Navigator has attempted to cause an aetherstorm. An Aetheric Navigator can use this ability even when embarked, but if they do so it only affects the SKYVESSEL they are embarked upon.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Ranging Pistol Missile12"23+4+-11
        Zephyrscope Melee1"23+4+-1

      • Bjorgen Thundrik [260pts]

        Categories: AETHER-KHEMIST, BJORGEN THUNDRIK, DUARDIN, HERO, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, SKYFARERS, Leader

        Unit: Bjorgen Thundrik, Unit Abilities: Aetheric Augmentation, Atmospheric Isolation, Weapon: Atmospheric Anatomiser, Heavy Instruments


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Bjorgen Thundrik 4"574+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Aetheric Augmentation In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SKYFARERS unit within 10" of this model, and then pick 1 type of weapon that unit is armed with. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that weapon type for that unit until your next hero phase. A weapon cannot benefit from this ability more than once at the same time.
        Atmospheric Isolation Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by any enemy models within 3" of any friendly models with this ability, to a minimum Attacks characteristic of 1.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Atmospheric Anatomiser Missile10"3D64+4+-21
        Heavy Instruments Melee1"34+4+-1

        • Skywardens [100pts]

          Selections: 3 Skywardens [100pts]

          Categories: DUARDIN, SKYWARDENS, SKYFARERS, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Other

        • Skywardens [100pts]

          Selections: 3 Skywardens [100pts]

          Categories: DUARDIN, SKYWARDENS, SKYFARERS, KHARADRON OVERLORDS, ORDER, Other

          Unit: Skywarden, Unit Abilities: Custodian, Fly, Hitchers, Skymines, Timed Charges, Weapon: Skypike (Custodian)


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Lightning-fast Volleys In each of your hero phases, you can choose a single unit (other than the Knight-Venator) from this battalion to make shooting attacks as if it were your shooting phase. A unit may only do so if two or more other units from this battalion are within 6".
        Marked for Destruction In any of your hero phases, the Knight-Venator from this battalion can loose their Star-fated Arrow as if it were your shooting phase. If this attack hits but the target unit is not slain, units from this battalion add 1 to their hit rolls against that unit for the remainder of the battle.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Endrinrigger 12"274+
        Prosecutor with Celestial Hammers 12"264+
        Prosecutor with Stormcall Javelins 12"264+
        Skywarden 12"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Custodian The leader of this unit is a Custodian. A Custodian makes 3 attacks rather than 2 with their Skypike.
        Endrincraft In each of your hero phases, a unit of Endrinriggers can repair a single SKYVESSEL within 1" or the one they are embarked upon. That SKYVESSEL immediately heals 1 wound.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Heralds of Righteousness Roll 3 dice instead of 2 dice when determining the charge move for this unit. In addition, you can declare a charge with this unit if it is within 18" of the enemy rather then 12"
        Hitchers This unit does not count towards the maximum number of SKYFARERS that can be embarked on a SKYVESSEL, and is not counted for the Overburdened rule.
        Mizzenmaster The leader of this unit is a Mizzenmaster. A Mizzenmaster makes 2 attacks rather than 1 with their Aethermatic Saw.
        Prosecutor-Prime The leader of this unit is the Prosecutor-Prime. Trained for brutal melee, he makes 3 attacks rather than 2 in the combat phase.
        Sigmarite Shields You can re-roll save rolls of 1 for this unit.
        Skymines Skywardens surround themselves with airborne mines that explode on contact. When an enemy unit that can fly ends its charge within 1" of any units of Skywardens, roll a dice for each model in the charging unit. On each roll of 6 the unit suffers a mortal wound.
        Stormcall Javelin If a Prosecutor throws a Stormcall Javelin at a unit over 9" away, the Javelin calls down a bolt of lightning; that attack has Damage 2 instead of 1
        Timed Charges Skywardens are practised at striking hard and then retreating quickly amidst timed explosions to cause massive confusion and damage. When a unit of Skywardens retreats, before moving the unit, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 3". On a roll of 6 that unit suffers a mortal wound.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Aethermatic Saw (Mizzenmaster) Melee1"23+2+-2D3
        Celestial Hammers Ranged18"24+4+-1
        Skypike (Custodian) Melee2"34+3+-1D3
        Stormcall Javelin Missile18"13+3+-1
        Stormcall Javelin (Melee) Melee1"14+4+-1

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Kharadron Overlords

          Selections: Barak-Nar, City of the First Sunrise

          Rules: WARSCROLL BATTALIONS

          Battle Trait: Scholars and Commanders, The Kharadron Code: Respect Your Commanders, Through Knowledge, Power, Trust Aethermatics, Not Superstition


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Scholars and Commanders Add 1 to any unbinding rolls made for Barak-Nar HEROES.
        The Kharadron Code Effect Ref
        Respect Your Commanders You can re-roll battleshock tests for your units while they are within 8" of a HERO from your army.
        Through Knowledge, Power Once per battle, in your opponent’s hero phase, your HEROES can each attempt to unbind one additional spell.
        Trust Aethermatics, Not Superstition Your HEROES can attempt to unbind one spell in each enemy hero phase as if they were wizards. If they can already attempt to unbind a spell, they can attempt to unbind one extra spell. Order Official FAQs and errata, Version 1.4 p1

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Kharadron Overlords

          Selections: Endless Skies

          Battle Trait: Stick to the Code


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Stick to the Code When you choose a Kharadron Overlords army that is not from one of the six major sky-ports, you can pick an artycle, an amendment and a footnote that most suit the background of your army from the list. Alternatively, you can roll a dice on each table to determine your army’s interpretation of the Kharadron Code.

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Kharadron Overlords

          Selections: Barak-Mhornar, City of Shadow

          Rules: WARSCROLL BATTALIONS

          Battle Trait: Fearsome Raiders, The Kharadron Code: Prosecute Wars With All Haste, Seek New Prospects, Who Strikes First, Strikes Hardest


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Fearsome Raiders Enemy units that take a battleshock test within 3" of any Barak-Mhornar units must add 1 to the roll.
        The Kharadron Code Effect Ref
        Prosecute Wars With All Haste In your first turn, your units can run and shoot.
        Seek New Prospects You can re-roll battleshock tests for your units while they are wholly within your opponent’s territory.
        Who Strikes First, Strikes Hardest Once per battle, in your hero phase, one of your units can attempt to charge as if it were the charge phase, or pile in and attack as if it were the combat phase.

    • Malign Sorcery [60pts]

      • Endless Spell: Lauchon the Soulseeker [60pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, LAUCHON THE SOULSEEKER, SHYISH, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Lauchon the Soulseeker, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Shyish, Fly, Navigate Deathly Tides, Predatory, Soul Price


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Lauchon the Soulseeker 6If successfully cast, set up a Lauchon the Soulseeker model wholly within 12" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, this model can move up to 18" instead of up to 12".
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Navigate Deathly Tides When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Predatory Lauchon the Soulseeker is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 12" and can fly.
        Soul Price Before a player makes a move with this model, that player can pick a friendly unit wholly within 3" of this model. Remove that unit and place it to one side. After this model has moved, set that unit up again wholly within 3" of this model and more than 9" from any enemy units. Once that unit has been set up, 1 model from that unit is immediately slain.

    • Scenery [100pts]

      • Scenery: Penumbral Engine [100pts]

        Categories: PENUMBRAL, PENUMBRAL ENGINE, SCENERY, STORMVAULT

        Unit Abilities: Deteriorating State, Repercussion of the Necroquake


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Deteriorating State At the start of each battle round after the first, roll a dice. On a 1-4 nothing happens. On a 5 or 6 the function that currently applies to all PENUMBRAL terrain features is replaced with the other function (see ‘Repercussions of the Necroquake’).
        Repercussion of the Necroquake At the start of the first battle round, after determining who has the first turn, roll a dice and consult the table on the right to determine which function all PENUMBRA terrain features on the battlefield gain for the duration of the battle.

        1-3: Orrey of Obfuscation: Re-roll save rolls of 1 for attacks that target units wholly within 12" of any Penumbral terrain features.

        4-6: Orrey of Illumination: At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 extra command point if any friendly HEROES are within 12" of any PENUMBRAL terrain features.

Selection Rules

WARSCROLL BATTALIONS: A Barak-Mhornar Grundstok Escort Wing (pg 129) can include up to one additional Grundstok Gunhauler. ()
